name: Challenge #91
description: We found this weird message in message.txt being passed around on the servers, we think we have a working decryption scheme. Take each number mod 37 and map it to the following character set: 0-25 is the alphabet (uppercase), 26-35 are the decimal digits, and 36 is an underscore. Wrap your decrypted message in the picoCTF flag format (i.e. picoCTF{decrypted_message})
